relation: To add FNF member : FNFADD*MDN (1 MDN at a time)
To modify FNF member : FNFMOD*OLD MDN*NEW MDN

textAfterTable: Note :- MDN = NT phone number (CDMA,PSTN,GSM). Call Tariff = For CDMA postpaid Rs 0.55/60 sec. Call Tariff =For CDMA prepaid Rs 0.75/60 sec. Tariff is exclusive of TSC & VAT.   Night Package Subscription (For CDMA Prepaid only) SN Description Remarks 1 For Subscription : Night Send SMS to 1415 Note :- Subscription effective for 1 month (10 pm - 6 am). unlimited ONNET (within NT network) voice calls allowed. Rs 20 (exclusive of TSC & VAT) per month is deducted.After 1 month re subscription is needed. Night Package is implemented for 3 months from 2070/10/22.   Voice calls made from RUIM distributed under Special Package to Female Community Health Volunteer (FCHV) in Nepal Telecoms network will be provided bonus of Rs 1 per 10 minute call duration. This offer is valid for 3 month from 2070/10/22.   Special RUIM sold to hearing and speech impaired person can send SMS to Nepal Telecoms network at 20 paisa/sms. This scheme is valid for period of 3 month from 2070/10/22. Such customers must submit certificates provided by institution or organization recognized by Government of Nepal for hearing and speech impaired. Voice calls from such RUIM cards are subjected to prevailing call tariffs.   Postpaid CDMA (Sky-phone) services are being redistributed from Kathmandu effective from 2070/10/22 while redistribution of Postpaid Sky-phone outside Kathmandu Valley will be
